alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Itasca and southeastern Koochiching Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Effie, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Itasca and southeastern Koochiching Counties, including the following locations... Bois Forte Band Deer Creek Area, Craigville and Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
